columns.name: BoroCode
columns.description: The borough which the access pedestrian signal (APS) was located in.

columns.name: BoroName
columns.description: The name of the borough where the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: BoroCD
columns.description: The three digit number that represents the borough and the community district.

columns.name: CounDist
columns.description: The Council District where the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: AssemDist
columns.description: The Assembly District where the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: StSenDist
columns.description: The State Senate District where the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: CongDist
columns.description: The Congressional District where the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The location of the two street intersections where the accessible pedestrian signals were installed.

top.item: East 170 Street and 150' West of Grand Concourse
Madison Avenue and East 134 Street (Pedestrian Crossing)
East Tremont Avenue and Hutchinson River Parkway
Flatbush Avenue and Glenwood Road (east leg)
Broadway with Pettit Avenue and 81 Street
Boston Road and Boller Avenue (South Leg)
Co-op City Boulevard and Asch Loop North

columns.name: Borough
columns.description: Same as BoroName

columns.name: Date_Insta
columns.description: The date the accessible pedestrian signal was installed.

columns.name: POINT_X
columns.description: The geographic coordinate of the accessible pedestrian signal in decimal degrees.

columns.name: POINT_Y
columns.description: The geographic coordinate of the accessible pedestrian signal in decimal degrees.

columns.name: FEMAFldz
columns.description: FEMA flood zone code for the accessible pedestrian signal.

columns.name: FEMAFldT
columns.description: FEMA flood zone description for the accessible pedestrian signal.

columns.name: HrcEvac
columns.description: The hurricane evacuation zone of the accessible pedestrian signal.

fields.name: Agency

view.description: NYC DOT's Accessible Pedestrian Signals (APS) are devices affixed to pedestrian signal poles to assist blind or low vision pedestrians in crossing the street. APS are wired to a pedestrian signal and send audible and vibrotactile indications when pedestrians push a botton installed at a crosswalk.
view.emailShareUrl: mailto:?subject=Accessible Pedestrian Signal Locations&body=Here is a dataset from NYC Open Data that I would like to share with you: https%3A%2F%2Fdata.cityofnewyork.us%2FTransportation%2FAccessible-Pedestrian-Signal-Locations%2Fde3m-c5p4

computedColumns.name: Zip Codes
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Zip Codes' (efsh-h5xi) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Community Districts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Community Districts' (f5dn-yrer) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Borough Boundaries
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Borough Boundaries' (yeji-bk3q) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: City Council Districts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'City Council Districts' (92fq-4b7q) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

computedColumns.name: Police Precincts
computedColumns.description: This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'Police Precincts' (sbqj-enih) the point in column 'the_geom' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
